alert.note: Alert for Castro; Hale; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hale, southeastern Castro and southern Swisher Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Hart, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainview, Tulia, Hart, Kress, Seth Ward and Edmonson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
